Distance Point to Point

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Info > Distance Point to Point
Shortcut: I, P
Commands: infodist | ip

Description:

This tool measures the exact distance between two points given by the user.

Procedure:

  1. Use the mouse to specify the location of the first point or enter a coordinate in the command line.
  2. Specify the second point.
  3. The measured distance is printed on screen and in the command line.
